column5: This course enables entry onto the MSc Leadership and Management if you did not gain a first or second class honours at degree level (or equivalent).Why choose this course?This course enables entry onto the MSc Leadership and Management if you did not gain a first or second class honours at degree level (or equivalent). It will add to your existing skills and knowledge providing you with enhanced understanding and abilities which will prepare you for Masters courses.
column7: Home - Full-time - £9690 per year International - Full-time - £17000 per year
